title: Bag with pen and ink drawing
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave with pen and ink drawing
description: Off-white bag with a very fine pen and ink drawing. On one side a putti writing on a slate: "souvenir." On the other, a scroll inscribed "Eloise to Lucy, Aug 22, 1810." These are bordered by minutely drawn garlands. Bag is wedge-shaped and hemmed at the top for passage of a drawstring.
name: Bag with pen and ink drawing
